text: The Sovereign State of the Bektashi Order (; ) is a proposed microstate and city-state entirely within Tirana, the capital of Albania, at the current World Headquarters of the religion of Bektashism. It would be smaller than the Vatican City and become the sovereign state with the smallest land area in the world, with a total land area of . Drafting of legislation to create the new state within Albania began in September 2024.
